text: Yes, you should. The first checklist question is whether you have installed Registrator for your repository. It would also help with a pointer to your repository and the attempt to perform the registration.

text: The comment in <https://github.com/bonevbs/HssMatrices.jl/commit/4ba5f4c07c1f0d927e25a06161e970012a17ba02> said that the PR would be updated after changing the version.

elements.text: said that the PR would be updated after changing the version.

text: Well, that's wrong. The version number is in the name of the branch: different version  -> different branch  -> different pull request

elements.text: Well, that's wrong. The version number is in the name of the branch: different version  -> different branch  -> different pull request

text: yes, I apologize. I misunderstood the way JuliaRegistrator works. I thought the command had to go into the commit comment
